jNab.core.choreography
Class Choreography

java.lang.Object
  jNab.core.choreography.Choreography

public class Choreography
extends java.lang.Object

Wrapping class for choreographies.

setChoreographyLibrary

public void setChoreographyLibrary(ChoreographyLibrary choreographyLibrary)
Setting the choreography library where the choreography is stored.

Parameters:
choreographyLibrary - the choreography library where the choreography is stored.

getChoreographyLibrary

public ChoreographyLibrary getChoreographyLibrary()
Getting the choreography library where the choreography is stored.

Returns:
the choreography library where the choreography is stored or null if the choreography is not part of any library

setData

public void setData(byte[] dataBytes)
Setting choreography data.

Parameters:
dataBytes - choreography raw data, excluding header and footer.

getData

public byte[] getData()
Getting choreography data.

Returns:
choreography raw data, excluding header and footer.

addTempoCommand

public void addTempoCommand(int time,
                            int frequencyRatio)
Appending a "tempo command" to choreography data.

Parameters:
time - the delay after the previous command.
frequencyRatio - the tempo frequency ratio, divider of 100 Hz (e.g. if frequency ratio is 1, frequency is 100 Hz, and if frequency ration is 10, frequency is 10 Hz).

addLedColorCommand

public void addLedColorCommand(int time,
                               byte led,
                               int r,
                               int g,
                               int b)
Appending a "LED color" command to choreography data.

Parameters:
time - the delay after the previous command.
led - the identifier of the LED to set.
r - red component value.
g - green component value.
b - blue component value.

addAbsoluteEarMoveCommand

public void addAbsoluteEarMoveCommand(int time,
                                      byte ear,
                                      int pos,
                                      byte direction)
Appending an "absolute ear move" command to choreography data.

Parameters:
time - the delay after the previous command
ear - the identifier of the ear to move.
pos - the position to reach with the ear.
direction - the direction taken by the ear (backward, forward).

addRelativeEarMoveCommand

public void addRelativeEarMoveCommand(int time,
                                      byte ear,
                                      int steps)
Appending a "relative ear move" command to choreography data.

Parameters:
time - the delay after the previous command.
ear - the identifier of the ear to move.
steps - the number of steps.

addLedPaletteCommand

public void addLedPaletteCommand(int time,
                                 byte led,
                                 int value)
Appending a "LED palette" command to choreography data. This command is used to set LED color to a value that has been specified in MessageBlock with PL or CL command.

Parameters:
time - the delay after the previous command.
led - the identifier of the LED to set.
value - the value to take (0 : CL, 1-7 : PL)

addPlayRandomMidi

public void addPlayRandomMidi(int time)
Appending a "play random midi music" command to choreography data.

Parameters:
time - the delay after the previous command.

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
N.B. Choreographies are equal if their names are the same.

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
